response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $140. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to those who appreciate them. I hope you'll find this deal compelling and decide to make the purchase.", "product_price": 140}
